author: Jon Hall
title: The Coronavirus Crisis Can Reshape America’s Future – For the Better
description: It's an understatement to say that things are uncertain right now. America's way of life has been stopped in its tracks from the coronavirus. The post The Coronavirus Crisis Can Reshape America’s Future – For the Better appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Amid the coronavirus pandemic, American life is up-in-the-air as President Trump warns of a rough week ahead.
  • Its important to analyze an after once the virus has run its course and no more confirmed cases are announced.
